English.Char_Desc_80: Fully featured text editor for coders
English.Char_Desc_250: Programmer's Notepad is a free, Open Source text editor for Windows with lots of features designed with coders in mind. Includes syntax highlighting, project support, basic autocomplete, scripting and macros and much more.
